title: Export Passwords
description: Download your password data as CSV or JSON. Enable password protection to export an encrypted file.
profileCompatibleDesc: Best for importing into other apps. Some passwd-sso specific fields are omitted.
profilePasswdSsoDesc: Includes passwd-sso specific fields for lossless restore in passwd-sso.
warning: If password protection is off, the exported file contains plain-text data. Store it securely and delete it when no longer needed.
passwordProtectDesc: When enabled, the exported file is encrypted with a password
passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters
encryptedWarning: The exported file will be encrypted. If you forget the password, the data cannot be recovered.
includeOrgsDesc: Also export passwords from organizations you belong to
exportSkipped: {count} entries could not be exported and were skipped.
